name: ChNPP Free Roam Prototype
description:
Welcome and thanks for stopping by!

This is a study/practice project, aimed to create a walk-able location of Chornobyl nuclear power plant (aka ChNPP) in its pre-Disaster state.

Primary goals include:
- getting plant's general exterior and interior layouts (since not much data is available, only basic stuff will be included)
- getting machinery layout (i.e. locations of reactors, pumps, turbines etc)
- learning about RBMK type reactors in general (operation, specs, trivia etc)

Initial concept trailer:

Some common notes:
- due to vehicle's simplicity, its handling is poor. generally it's fishtail-happy, so be cautious with your steering/throttle
- on windows 7, an error message appears upon start, however the game would proceed to launch in the background
- it may be overbright on your display - please use in-game settings to adjust gamma and sun brightness (try really bold adjusts)
- the helicopter's only purpose is to represent the scale. No drive-able helos are planned atm
- the sun's position is incorrect on purpose
- vehicle's type (brdm-1) in not period-correct
- the turbines are totally out of place (I'm looking for better data)
- currently project uses static/baked shadows
- known bug: ladders could be glitchy sometimes
